name: create filter Tab in opportunity page -- @1.3

steps.name: When click on All opportunities filter button
And select _attributes you want to filter "Assign" and "Sarath" andtabName "Assigne"
And validate tab is created or _nott
And click on kanban view and check it is selected in created filter or not "Assigne"
When click on new filter tab and _deltee
And now check tab is deleted or _nott
Then check in opportunity page that it automatically in openfilter
